title: Minimalia WordPress Theme (2 Columns)
description:
Minimalia is an amazing, responsive WordPress theme that has the perfect combination of aesthetics and functionality. As the name suggests, it is a minimal theme, with a beautiful and clean design that keeps the focus where it should be: the content. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s also loaded with great functionality such as our custom widgets and optimizations.


Minimalia Features:

Magazine Style
Minimalia WordPress theme includes a sleek featured posts slider, and a dual column magazine layout.


Options Panel
Like all MyThemeShop themes, Minimalia includes our custom options panel so you can customize your theme easily.


Integrated Social Media
Promote your site easily using the built in social media buttons, which allow your readers to help promote the content they like from your site.


Shortcodes
Add highlights and features to your posts with a click, using the shortcodes that are included in Minimalia.


SEO Optimized
Google is becoming harder and harder for bloggers to deal with, but Minimalia makes it simple to get top SEO rankings.


Speed
With lazy loading, optimized code and a clean design, Minimalia will put all other themes to shame with its loading time.


Custom Widgets
Add sidebar widgets without having to use extra plugins. Minimalia includes the most popular sidebar widgets that weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve customized for added power.


Related Posts
Get your users engaged, by showing them more posts and keeping them on your site for longer.


Ad Optimized
Maximize your advertising earnings and keep your readership happy at the same time, with MinimaliaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s ad optimisation.


Featured Posts Slider
Show off your best posts with the slick featured posts slider, guaranteed to get more clicks from your readers.


Responsive
Minimalia is 100% responsive, meaning it works on any browser or window size. No more tinkering with plugins or half-working themes
